MarketingInfo.element: COUGAR Armor S je bil zasnovan za tiste, ki ne želijo samo vrhunskega udobja, temveč tudi nabor luksuznih funkcij, ki njihovo igralno izkušnjo dvignejo na novo raven. Z vrhunskim PVC usnjem, posebno peno visoke gostote in edinstvenim karo vzorcem je ta igralni prestol primeren za kralje spletnih aren. Obdarjen z ergonomsko zasnovo, ustvarjeno posebej za igričarje, je COUGAR Armor S ustvarjen za udobno oporo vašega telesa. Njegova visoka hrbtna struktura bo pravilno podpirala vaš spodnji del hrbta in zmanjšala napetost v njem. Armor S vam prinaša le najboljše. Njegovo izjemno debelo vrhunsko PVC usnje je prijetno na dotik in prepušča zrak, kar vas bo ohranjalo sveže in udobno. Za dodatno podporo in udobje Armor S vključuje dve udobni blazini za vašo glavo in ledveni del. Osredotočite se na igro! Armor S se bo v vsakem trenutku prilagodil vašim potrebam s petimi možnostmi prilagajanja: preprosto prilagodite višino Armor S z visokokakovostnim batnim dvigom. Z Armor S niste omejeni na fiksne stopnice, ko naslonite svoj stol. Namesto da bi bili omejeni na nekaj možnosti, lahko poiščete točno točko, ki poveča vaše udobje, in ostanete tam. Armor S vam omogoča naklon do 180º. Med delom ostanite zravnani in se ulezite za počitek, ko končate. Funkcija nagibanja Armor S vam omogoča, da z vrtenjem gumba, ki se nahaja pod stolom, prilagodite njegovo vedenje in nadzirate stopnjo upora, ko ga nagnete. Pripravljeni, da ustrezajo vašim potrebam, nasloni za roke Armor S vam omogočajo, da jih prilagodite na štiri različne načine, v treh dimenzijah in v osmih smereh: udobno počivanje komolca, podlakti in roke.Idealno za ohranjanje razpoložljivosti naslonov za roke, ne glede na to, katero stališče zavzamete. Premikanje naslonjala za roke navzgor ali navzdol vam bo pomagalo najti najprimernejši položaj za uživanje v igrah. Primerna za vse telesne velikosti in položaje. Armor S je tako trden, kot pove že njegovo ime, in je bil ustvarjen z najboljšimi komponentami, ki zagotavljajo ne le, da bo zdržal res dolgo časa, ampak tudi, da boste lahko varno uporabljali vse njegove neverjetne funkcije. Armour S kosti so sestavljene iz jekla, ki ne zagotavlja le dolgoročne vzdržljivosti, temveč nudi tudi močno podporo vašemu telesu. Armor S nosi znak pravega igričarja: medtem ko drugi tiskajo logotipe na stol, je COUGAR izvezel tisto, kar je postalo simbol strasti do igranja, tako da se več let ne bo obrabilo. Srce vsakega igralnega stola je njegov plinski dvižni cilinder. COUGAR ni varčeval s kakovostjo za to ključno komponento in je uporabil plinski dvižni cilinder razreda 4, da zagotovi varnost in zanesljivost brez primere. Z gladkim delovanjem in neverjetno odpornostjo je najboljše jamstvo za kakovost Armor S.

MarketingInfo.element:
You’ll surely be able to sit back and relax in this Lorgar Base 311 gaming chair. The dense cold-moulded memory foam seat follows your body shape, and premium-feel eco-leather will withstand years of use. With the neck and lumbar support pillows, you’ll effortlessly maintain a healthy posture. Built around a 1.8mm metal frame, this armchair has an unmatched level of durability. The backrest has impressive recline angles, and a five-star aluminium base will ensure your stability while leaning back. Large 75mm PU casters provide quiet movement. A powerful Class 4 Gas Lift will help you set an optimal height to keep things comfortable. The armrests have four axes of movement. For us, proper gaming chair design isn’t just about comfort. It’s about the care of our customers’ well-being..

Features:

  • High-quality PU eco-leather
  • 1.8mm metal frame
  • Reinforced 4D armrests
  • Class 4 Gas Lift
  • Multiblock mechanism
  • 90° – 155° adjustable backrest
  • Headrest and lumbar support pillows
  • Five-star base with 75 mm PU casters
  • Maximum weight of chair load - 150kg

MarketingInfo.element: Gaming stol COUGAR OUTRIDER popolnoma izpolnjuje potrebe profesionalnih igričarjev s kombinacijo udobja in vzdržljivosti. Oblikovalna pena visoke gostote, jeklen okvir, kovinsko podnožje, nagnjeno naslonjalo, perforirano vrhunsko PVC usnje, občutljivo vezenje in ergonomsko oblikovan naslon za roke vam zlahka pomagajo najti vaš najudobnejši položaj. Pridite in raziščite igro ter pozdravite vsako bitko za zmago! COUGAR OUTRIDER prinaša izjemno udobje, ki ga potrebujete za temeljito uživanje v dolgih igralnih sejah. Popolnoma nastavljiv in izdelan iz izjemno kakovostnih materialov s peno za oblikovanje visoke gostote, ta igralni stol ima tudi edinstven dizajn COUGAR, ki je postal znak strasti do igranja. Perforirano usnje OUTRIDER vam prinaša le najboljše. Ima lastnosti vpijanja vlage in odvajanja znoja, zaradi česar boste sveži in udobni. Počutili se boste bolj prijetno in bolj dihajoče kot kdaj koli prej! Za dodatno podporo in udobje OUTRIDER vključuje dve udobni blazini za sprostitev glave in ledvenega dela. Osredotočite se na igro! OUTRIDER ergonomska pena visoke gostote, ki vam nudi brezhibno udobje in odlično podporo z boljšo stilsko obliko in preprečuje deformacije.OUTRIDER se bo v vsakem trenutku prilagodil vašim potrebam z več možnostmi prilagajanja: Preprosto prilagodite višino Outriderja z visokokakovostnim batnim dvigom, Outrider vam omogoča naklon do 180º. Med delom ostanite zravnani in po delu lezite za počitek. Funkcija nagibanja Outrider vam omogoča, da z vrtenjem gumba, ki se nahaja pod stolom, prilagodite njegovo obnašanje in nadzirate stopnjo upora, ko ga nagnete. Nastavitev višine: Premikanje naslonjala za roke navzgor ali navzdol vam bo pomagalo najti najprimernejši položaj za uživanje v igrah. Prilagoditev levo/desno: primerna za vse telesne velikosti in položaje. Outrider je tako trden, kot pove že njegovo ime, in je bil ustvarjen z najboljšimi komponentami, ki zagotavljajo ne le, da bo zdržal res dolgo časa, ampak tudi, da boste lahko varno uporabljali vse njegove neverjetne funkcije. Srce vsakega igralnega stola je njegov plinski dvižni cilinder. COUGAR ni varčeval s kakovostjo za to ključno komponento in je uporabil plinski dvižni cilinder razreda 4, da zagotovi neprimerljivo varnost in zanesljivost. Z gladkim delovanjem in neverjetno odpornostjo je najboljše jamstvo za kakovost Outriderja S

MarketingInfo.element: Popolna kombinacija funkcionalnosti in ergonomije, COUGAR Terminator je igralni stol z edinstveno mehansko estetiko. Zagotavlja veliko stopnjo razburjenja, revolucionarno zmogljivost in odlično ergonomijo, ki jo radi uporabljajo igričarji in igralci e-športa.Terminatorjeva edinstvena zasnova osrednje kobilice in fino nastavljeno hrbtišče zagotavlja popolno vezavo na naravno krivuljo hrbtenice. Ustvarjen je tako, da podpira celoten hrbet in nudi izjemno udobje. Struktura Terminatorja bo ustrezno podpirala vaš spodnji del hrbta in vas ohranjala v pravilnem sedečem položaju. Ledvena zasnova lahko v celoti prenese obremenitev ledvenega predela za lajšanje bolečin in utrujenosti med dolgimi igralnimi sejami. Zasnova hrbtnega naslona Terminatorja z visokim prezračevanjem omogoča, da se telesna toplota razprši skozi naslonjalo, kar vas ohranja sveže, ohlajene in suhe med dolgo igralno sejo. Terminatorjevo naslonjalo iz industrijske plastike, ojačane z vlakni (PAFRP), skupaj z zasnovo iz pene z visoko gostoto ni le močno, trpežno, ampak podpira tudi fleksibilnost in udobje vaših gibov. COUGAR ima novo vrhunsko usnje Hyper-Dura, ki je 12-krat bolj trpežno v primerjavi z običajnim usnjem. Terminatorja je mogoče natančno nastaviti za igralce s popolnoma prilagodljivim dizajnom. Enostavno nastavljiv naslon za glavo, naklon hrbtišča in višina. Kovinska 4D naslonjala za roke so nastavljiva tudi po višini, širini, globini in nihanju. Z lahkoto poiščite svojo najbolj udobno in popolno držo. Terminator je ekskluzivno opremljen z izjemno veliko aluminijasto medosno razdaljo. V primerjavi s standardno medosno razdaljo ima Terminatorjeva ekskluzivna medosna razdalja 29,6" premera, skupaj z izjemno velikimi 3" kolesi, kar zagotavlja stabilnost in vzdržljivost.

MarketingInfo.element:
RGB gaming headset Darkless GH-9A

Light 'em up with the all-new Canyon Gaming headset – Darkless GH-9A!
The high-precision 50mm speaker drivers deliver a vivid sound field, so you'll feel right in the middle of the action. Thanks to the comfortable headband and luxurious ear cushions, you can wear them for hours without any discomfort. Volume wheel control allows tactile adjustment with no distraction from the game.
Hold on, we're just getting there. Canyon Darkless features an eye-catching RGB backlight of the headset that goes across the headband, too. You'll dispel any darkness, we can give you that! And with its omnidirectional microphone on a flexible gooseneck, you'll be able to communicate clearly with your teammates and coordinate your strategies like a pro.
So why settle for the mediocrity of other headsets? Upgrade to Canyon Darkless gaming headset today and experience the battle like never before!

Features:

  • Elastic headband
  • Flexible microphone
  • High quality soft ear cushion

Product.ProductDescription: LOGITECH Brezžične Gaming Slušalke G PRO X LIGHTSPEED, Črna, Modri Mikrofon

MarketingInfo.element: Pripravljeni, da se vam pridružijo v vaših bitkah, Phontum Essential so stereo igralne slušalke, ki vam prinašajo vse funkcije, ki jih potrebujete za uspeh pri spletnem igranju. 40 mm gonilnik Phontum Essential vam bo prinesel vse zvočne podrobnosti, ki jih potrebujete za uživanje v igrah, in poskrbel, da ne boste zamudili nobenega odtenka ali signala v igri. Za dodatno udobje smo ušesne blazinice Phontum Essential naredili posebej velike. Udobno bodo pokrili vaše uho in poskrbeli za prijetno izkušnjo ter odlično izolacijo. Hrbtenica Phontum Essential je jekleni naglavni trak, ki zagotavlja vzdržljivost in prilagodljivost. Ta slušalka vam bo služila dolgo, dolgo! Da bi vam omogočil enostavno komunikacijo s soigralci, mikrofon Phontum Essential vključuje tehnologijo za odpravljanje šumov. To zagotavlja, da hrup v ozadju ne moti vaše koordinacije v igri. Ne bi moglo biti bolj priročno: integriran nadzorni sistem vam omogoča prilagajanje glasnosti na poti in po potrebi izklop mikrofona.

COUGAR Omnes Essential so brezžične slušalke z izboljšanim stereo gonilnikom in mikrofonom za poživitev vaše igralne zmogljivosti. Je vaš najboljši brezžični soigralec. Slušalke COUGAR Omnes Essential delujejo v svetovnem pasu 2,4 GHz ISM, do 3 Mb/s RF podatkovne hitrosti za oddajanje zvoka visoke ločljivosti v Stereo-boost™ in vhodu za mikrofon. Med 8 do 10 metri brezžičnega dosega se lahko znebite kabla med igranjem v katerem koli prostoru brez prekinitve povezave. Omnes Essential vam omogoča, da se gladko potopite v bojišče ali dirkališče. Na podlagi velikih 53 mm gonilnikov in najboljšega stereo načina okoliške podrobnosti povečajo realnost v različnih usmeritvah v vaših ušesih, od navpičnega do vodoravnega položaja. Omnes Essential naredi igralno izkušnjo občutek prisotnosti in zvestobe brez primere. Omnes Essential je popolnoma združljiv s sistemom Windows Sonic v najnovejši izdaji sistema Windows 10™, da doseže virtualni prostorski učinek. Z Omnes Essential njegov velik 9,7-milimetrski mikrofon za odpravljanje šumov sprejema prefinjen frekvenčni glasovni ton. Podaljšano dolžino pobiralne enote je mogoče prilagoditi za večjo jasnost. Upogljiva palica zagotavlja dodatno prilagodljivost za ročno premikanje in izboljša kakovost pobiranja. V primerjavi z drugimi brezžičnimi slušalkami so Omnes Essential oblikovane s svetlobnimi učinki. Ima šest prednastavljenih učinkov, tekoče RGB, oranžne, rdeče, zeleno modre in rumene barve za vaše sloge. Omnes Essential vam omogoča samodejno udobje z večosno nastavitvijo in izredno debelim naglavnim trakom iz pene. Kombinacija navpičnih in vodoravnih struktur bo dosegla najboljšo igralno izkušnjo brez pritiska v vseh pogojih. Omnes Essential v brezžični povezavi 2.4G omogoča dolgo delovanje baterije v 20 urah. Če želite doseči neprekinjeno igranje iger, lahko polnite tudi med delovanjem in ga izključite, medtem ko je polnjenje končano, LED od modre do standardne oranžne. Omnes Essential je združljiv z večino platform z brezžično povezavo 2,4G in 3,5 mm telefonskim priključkom. Omogoča vam, da uživate v njem prek več platform in navzkrižne povezave. Linijska krmilna enota lahko prosto upravlja gumb za potrditev/zavrnitev.

Površina mikro in gladke teksture z zašitimi robovi za večjo vzdržljivost in hitrejše gibanje. COUGAR Speed EX je bil zasnovan tako, da predstavlja gladko teksturo, ki vam omogoča izvajanje hitrih gibov in še vedno vse pod nadzorom. Debelina 4 mm zagotavlja pravo raven podpore in udobja za dolga obdobja igranja. Gumijasta podlaga COUGAR Speed EX je bila posebej zasnovana tako, da zagotavlja, da ostane trdno tam, kjer bi morala biti, tudi ko se po njej izvajajo hitri in ostri gibi. To je doseženo z zasnovo v obliki valov, ki uspe prejeti kinetično energijo iz vaših gibov, ne da bi to vplivalo na splošni položaj blazinice. SREDNJA: mere- 320 x 270 x 4mm

MarketingInfo.element: Za izjemno spretno izkušnjo upravljanja je AIRBLADER rojen, da postane resničen. Po pravilu obrazec sledi funkciji smo poskušali združiti najmanjšo površino, ki smo se je dotaknili z miško, nato pa jo spremeniti v fascinantno nov videz. Ne samo, da je izjemno lahek, ampak ohranja tudi sijajen občutek uporabe. Medtem pa sta obojestranska in kompaktna zasnova bolj primerna za sloge s kremplji. Za tiste, ki imate radi lahke miške, AIRBLADER prinaša nemoteno upravljanje z visoko natančnostjo in popolnoma nov dizajn, ki ga še nihče ni videl. Lahka igralna miška AIRBLADER je drugačna od tistih s satastim dizajnom. Z velikim območjem votlega dizajna od sredine do repa miške in ga okrepite z industrijskim dizajnom in optimizacijo strukture. Teža miške je presenetljivo stisnjena na dih jemajočo majhno težo pri 62 gramih. Vsekakor je dobra izbira za tiste, ki imajo radi lahke miške. AIRBLADER, zasnovan tako, da nudi igralcem neprimerljivo zmogljivost v intenzivnem igranju, je opremljen z visokokakovostnimi mehanskimi mikro stikali, kar je do 50 milijonov klikov. Ne samo, da prinaša najkrajši odzivni čas, ampak zagotavlja tudi večjo vzdržljivost. Lahka igralna miška AIRBLADER z drsnim kodirnikom, ki je primeren za igranje iger, omogoča jasne povratne informacije drsenja z zaskočnimi gibi in odlično vzdržljivost za 2 milijona ciklov življenjske dobe. S popolnim ukazom med intenzivnimi operacijami AIRBLADER poskrbi, da lahko igralci nadzorujejo z najbolj natančno natančnostjo in premagajo nasprotnike vse naenkrat. Lahka igralna miška AIRBLADER, opremljena z ekskluzivnim napetostnim sistemom COUGAR BOUNCE-ON, ki uporablja kovinsko vzmet za odpravo naključnega odbijanja med gumbom in stikalom. Na ta način lahko ohranite stabilen in dosleden občutek klikanja za boljšo zmogljivost med intenzivnim igranjem. Zato bo lahka igričarska miška AIRBLADER nedvomno najboljši partner igričarjem. Z najnaprednejšim optičnim senzorjem PMW3389, ki podpira do 16000 DPI, je AIRBLADER sposoben zagotoviti popolno sledenje in nudi smrtonosno natančnost v intenzivnem igranju. Kabel AIRBLADER ima vrhunsko prilagodljivost za zmanjšanje upora in motenj, kar vam omogoča hitrejše in bolj gladke poteze za boljši nadzor. PTFE drsalke iz deviškega razreda AIRBLADER ponujajo gladko drsenje brez napora z nizkim trenjem, zaradi česar je miška bolj odzivna in postane bolj okretna med igranjem. S priročnim in intuitivnim vmesnikom COUGAR UIX omogoča igralcem, da preprosto sestavijo prilagojeno funkcijo vseh tipk, hkrati pa lahko ustvari tudi nastavitev makrov. Poleg tega s preklapljanjem med 3 različnimi načini in sodelovanjem s 6 nastavljivimi gumbi AIRBLADERja le uresničuje različne kombinacije in igralcem prinaša več možnosti, da sami nastavijo posebne funkcije.

MarketingInfo.element:
Looking for a high-precision gaming tool? Lorgar Stricter 579 could be your mouse of choice.

Ergonomic design, combined with its classic size and weight, minimises your time getting to grips with Stricter 579. The mouse feet are made of 100% PTFE and provide the smoothest glide. The ease of motion is further optimised by the flexible and durable silicone cable.

With its advanced Pixart PMW3336 sensor of 12000 DPI, this sleek and sturdy mouse delivers precision and accuracy like never before. The OLED screen, nine durable programmable buttons with an impressive lifecycle of 50 million clicks for the left and right buttons, two switches with force adjustment, and synchronisable RGB backlight bring personalisation to unmatched levels. All thanks to Lorgar WP — our proprietary platform to enrich your gaming experience.

Stricter 579 combines comfort, functionality, and performance in one powerful package.

  • Max DPI: 12 000
  • Polling rate:125/250/500/1000Hz

  • The switches lifecycle: 50 mln clicks

MarketingInfo.element:
This Lorgar Ace 422 gaming chair invites you to kick back and relax. Its dense cold-moulded memory foam seat is designed to conform to your body shape. The upholstery is made of a durable anti-stain fabric. With the included neck and lumbar support pillows, you can maintain a healthy posture and reduce fatigue during long gaming sessions. Lorgar Ace 422 is built around a sturdy 1.8mm metal frame, making it incredibly durable. The backrest can be reclined to an impressive angle of up to 155 degrees, and the five-star aluminium base ensures stability when leaning back. Moving around your workspace is a breeze with the large 75mm PU casters, which provide quiet movement while being safe for your floor. You can adjust the chair's height with the powerful Class 4 Gas Lift to find the perfect comfort level. The armrests are also adjustable, with four axes. For us, proper gaming chair design isn't just about comfort. It's about the care for our customers' well-being.

Features:

  • Durable anti-stain fabric
  • 1.8mm metal frame
  • Reinforced 4D armrests
  • Class 4 Gas Lift

MarketingInfo.element:
You’ll surely be able to sit back and relax in this Lorgar Base 311 gaming chair. The dense cold-moulded memory foam seat follows your body shape, and premium-feel eco-leather will withstand years of use. With the neck and lumbar support pillows, you’ll effortlessly maintain a healthy posture. Built around a 1.8mm metal frame, this armchair has an unmatched level of durability. The backrest has impressive recline angles, and a five-star aluminium base will ensure your stability while leaning back. Large 75mm PU casters provide quiet movement. A powerful Class 4 Gas Lift will help you set an optimal height to keep things comfortable. The armrests have four axes of movement. For us, proper gaming chair design isn’t just about comfort. It’s about the care of our customers’ well-being..

VM410 so naglavne slušalke, opremljene z vrhunskim zvokom in inovativno strukturno zasnovo. Veliki 53-milimetrski gonilniki z membrano iz grafena ustvarjajo živahno frekvenco in se osredotočajo na pravo zajemanje zvoka z 9,7-milimetrskim mikrofonom. Inovativni kovinski spoj omogoča trojne nastavitve za optimalno ergonomijo in lahko udobje. Cougar VM410 vas bo potopil v vsako igro. Aluminij ima lahko, a robustno strukturo, kovinski tečaj pa zagotavlja pritisk in udobje med dolgimi igralnimi sejami.

MarketingInfo.element: Minos XT je okretna in zmogljiva igralna miška, idealna za tiste, ki uživajo v agilni igralni izkušnji. Ta igralna miška je narejena tako, da traja. Za dvema glavnima gumboma sta dve originalni igralni stikali, ki zagotavljata vsaj 20 milijonov klikov. Osvetljeno območje Minos XT vam omogoča, da ustvarite najboljše igralno vzdušje za vaš igralni prostor. Izberite enega od sedmih čudovitih prednastavljenih načinov, ki smo jih pripravili za vas, in uživajte v predstavi! Optični senzor ADNS-3050 je bil zasnovan posebej za igričarje. Z možnostjo prilagajanja ravni DPI do 4000 DPI boste lahko natančno prilagodili njegovo delovanje za doseganje idealnega ravnovesja med hitrostjo in natančnostjo. Minos XT podpira legendarni COUGAR UIX, najboljši sistem za upravljanje igralnih naprav na trgu. Uporabniku prijazen vmesnik in popolna prilagoditev šestih gumbov, vključno z makri, bližnjicami in drugim, odpirata nov svet možnosti.

Wireless gamepad Brighter GPW-04

Canyon Brighter GPW-04 is the gaming companion that ignites your passion for play. With a seamless 2.4GHz wireless connection, this gamepad breaks free from the shackles of cables, giving you the freedom to conquer your gaming world from any corner of the room. Whether you're a Windows warrior, a PS4 pro, an Xbox360 aficionado, an Android adventurer, or a PS3 veteran, Canyon Brighter ensures that no game is left unplayed.

The 17 buttons in a familiar layout allow you to execute your moves with finesse. With its convenient Plug & Play functionality, you can jump straight into action. As if that wasn't enough, the crystal-clear body of Brighter looks stunning. Combined with the mesmerizing RGB backlight, this gamepad will transform your room into a pulsating battleground. Don't miss out on immersive gameplay experiences — the gamepad has two vibration motors that bring every victory to life. Experience gaming with the gamepad's 8 hours of playtime thanks to its robust polymer battery. To keep you in the game, Canyon Brighter comes with a generous 2m charging cable, making it a breeze to connect and recharge.

So, grab hold of the Canyon Brighter gamepad and get ready to dominate the digital realm!!

MarketingInfo.element:
Aeno Premium Eco pametni grelnik, bel

-Estetski in minimalističen dizajn v beli barvi
-Inovativno infrardeče in konvekcijsko gretje
-Prihranek energije do 50 %
-Ustreza vsakemu prostoru ali stanovanju do velikosti 30 m2
-Skrbi za vaše zdravje in dobro počutje.

Idealna kombinacija hitrega ogrevanja in prihranka energije Aeno Premium Eco pametni grelnik za svoje delovanje porabi 2-x manj električne energije v primerjavi z vsemi ostalimi klasičnimi grelci. Energijsko varčna infrardeča tehnologija naredi grelnik AENO stroškovno učinkovitejši od večine tradicionalnih ogrevalnih sistemov, kot so klimatske naprave, plinski grelniki, centralno ogrevanje, talno ogrevanje, s čimer je poskrbljeno za nizek račun za elektriko. Grelna plošča se ob padcu samodejno izklopi, oglasi se zvočno opozorilo, vi pa na svojo aplikacijo prejmete obvestilo. Opremljena je tudi z zaščito pred nenamerno aktivacijo s strani otrok, Child Lock. Wi-Fi tehnologija in moderen dizajn.

MarketingInfo.element:
Aeno Premium Eco pametni grelnik, črn

-Estetski in minimalističen dizajn v črni barvi
-Inovativno infrardeče in konvekcijsko gretje
-Prihranek energije do 50 %
-Ustreza vsakemu prostoru ali stanovanju do velikosti 30 m2
-Skrbi za vaše zdravje in dobro počutje.

Idealna kombinacija hitrega ogrevanja in prihranka energije Aeno Premium Eco pametni grelnik za svoje delovanje porabi 2-x manj električne energije v primerjavi z vsemi ostalimi klasičnimi grelci. Energijsko varčna infrardeča tehnologija naredi grelnik AENO stroškovno učinkovitejši od večine tradicionalnih ogrevalnih sistemov, kot so klimatske naprave, plinski grelniki, centralno ogrevanje, talno ogrevanje, s čimer je poskrbljeno za nizek račun za elektriko. Grelna plošča se ob padcu samodejno izklopi, oglasi se zvočno opozorilo, vi pa na svojo aplikacijo prejmete obvestilo. Opremljena je tudi z zaščito pred nenamerno aktivacijo s strani otrok, Child Lock. Wi-Fi tehnologija in moderen dizajn.

MarketingInfo.element: Visokozmogljiv hladilni ventilator COUGAR VORTEX VX120 ne zagotavlja samo vrhunskih svetlobnih učinkov ARGB za vaše ohišje, temveč tudi učinkovito izboljša učinek hlajenja. Hladilni ventilator COUGAR VORTEX VX120 z vgrajenimi priključki 5V-ARGB in 24 kroglicami žarnice ARGB zagotavlja različne in barvite svetlobne učinke od koderkoli skozi svetlobni obroč in lopatico ventilatorja hkrati. S funkcijo krmiljenja PWM pa ga je mogoče samodejno prilagoditi med hitrostjo od 600 do 1500 RPM, da ustreza različnim pogojem, in poskrbi za najboljše ravnovesje/ekstremno zmogljivost. Hladilni ventilator COUGAR VORTEX VX120 je opremljen z gumijastimi dušilci na štirih robovih ventilatorja, ki se odlično obnesejo pri preprečevanju tresljajev. Zmanjša lahko hrup zaradi vrzeli pri vgradnji ali resonanco v ohišju in optimizira tiho delovanje vašega računalniškega sistema. S krmilnikom COUGAR CORE BOX V3 (izbirno) lahko hladilni ventilator COUGAR VORTEX VX120 maksimira svojo zmogljivost. Igralcem ne omogoča samo ustvarjanja ekskluzivnega visokozmogljivega hladilnega sistema, temveč ima tudi popoln svetlobni učinek ARGB.

MarketingInfo.element:
Cleaning sprays for plastic and metal surfaces CCL22

This spray will help with cleaning and disinfection of all types of plastic and metal surfaces, such as housings of kitchen appliances. The cleansing filler does not leave stains on surfaces, and makes your devices and appliances shine. The anti-static effect protects surfaces from getting covered up with dust right after the cleaning. Ingredients of the cleaning filler will not affect colours or smoothness of a plastic or a metal surface.

Features:

  • Antistatic effect
  • Disinfection
  • For all types of plastic surfaces
  • Does not leave stains
  • Does not contain alcohol

MarketingInfo.element:
BEOPLAY EX

Next-gen wireless earbuds

As versatile as they are beautiful, these earbuds with wireless charging case and active noise cancellation bring deep sound and snug comfort in one sleek package.
 

Comfortable fit


Rain and sweatproof


Made for multi-tasking

SNUG FIT
Comfort you can count on

Beoplay EX fits. With your lifestyle and your ears. An all-new ergonomic design gives you complete comfort right out of the case, while soft tips let you listen for hours without fatigue. Whether you're walking, running or jumping, the stick silhouette ensures stability, while staying snug and flush to your ears.
 
ADAPTIVE ACTIVE NOISE CANCELLATION
Peace of mind

Turn a loud train ride into a moment of focus. Or make your run a meditative experience. EX monitors ambient outside sound and adapts to cut it out, so you can enjoy distraction-free listening and the highest quality calls – wherever you are. Want to let the world in? Transparency Mode takes care of that in just a tap.
 


POTENT SOUND
Looks small. Sounds mighty.

Beoplay EX punches well above its size, with fuller bass and a level of detail that is unbeatable for such a compact form. A 9.2mm driver in each earbud brings the power – everywhere, every time.


WATERPROOF CONSTRUCTION
Water? Don't sweat it.

Caught in a downpour? Bring it on. Beoplay EX stays waterproof in up to a metre of water for 30 minutes, and stands up to dust and sand, thanks to its IP57-rated build quality. There's no such thing as bad weather, just the wrong earphones.


MICROPHONE
Clear? Crystal.

Carefully positioned to be closer to your mouth, the stick houses six microphones that let you take and make calls with confidence. Background noise? Intelligent beam-forming technology distinguishes between your voice and other sounds, so you're always crystal clear.
Best in glass

Form meets function. Fashion meets fidelity. A glass touch surface brings precision and jewel-like beauty, while an aluminium outer ring offers protection and a final aesthetic flourish. Crafted to last, made to be worn.


PRECISION DETAILING


JEWEL-LIKE DESIGN


LITHOGRAPHIC LOGOS


REAL GLASS AND ALUMINIUM


BATTERY LIFE
Little goes a long way
–
Listen for up to 6 hours with ANC on, or 8 hours with ANC off. When it's time to recharge, simply slide EX back into their wireless charging case to get juiced up for the next play. A total of 28 hours.


CONNECTIVITY
Quick to pair. Quick to play.
–
Slide the earbuds out of the aluminium case and you're connected. That easy. Enjoy low-latency listening across both Android and iOS with Bluetooth 5.2 and aptX(TM) Adaptive technology. You can switch devices seamlessly with Multipoint pairing. EX has you covered.
 
INCLUDED IN THE BOX

  • Charging case with wireless Qi receiver

  • Earbuds: Left and Right

  • USB-A/USB-C cable for charging, 0.5 m

  • COMPLY™ Medium size

  • Silicone tips, 4 sizes

  • Quick start guide

MarketingInfo.element:
BEOSOUND EXPLORE

All-round sound for the adventurous

Portable. Tough. Ready to go. No matter where your adventures take you, the uncompromising sound quality of the Beosound Explore will get you there. And with its hardened, scratch-resistant, and fully dust and waterproof shell you’ll arrive no worse for wear.
 
 
DURABILITY IN ITS DNA
Tough enough for any expedition
–
Built to go where you go, Beosound Explore is an ultra-durable wireless speaker. The tough rubberised base and aluminium body mean it can be placed safely on all sorts of surfaces – from muddy campsites to sandy beaches – while a meticulously constructed internal design protects against drops and falls. From the hard anodised aluminium shell developed in Factory 5, Denmark, to the waterproof strap and carabiner, every element of the construction blends high performance with durability.
Designed to go with you

Meticulously designed so you can take it with you, Beosound Explore is a tactile speaker that fits in the palm of your hand. Clip to a belt, strap to a backpack or simply grab it and go.


LIGHTWEIGHT AT ONLY 631 GRAMS


GRAB-AND-GO SHAPE


WEATHER RESISTANT, FLEXIBLE STRAP


STRONG, CLIP-ON CARABINER

Durable


Portable


Powerful

MUSIC ANYWHERE
Superior sound, even outdoors
–
With surprisingly heavy bass for a speaker of its size, Beosound Explore brings your music to places beyond the expected. The grill is precision cut to deliver True360 sound, driven by dual 1.8 full range drivers that pack a real punch. Whether set in the middle of a campsite, hung from a tent or perched on a rock halfway up a mountain, Beosound Explore provides powerful sound.


EXCEPTIONAL BATTERY LIFE
Powering your adventures
–
With up to 27 hours of playtime at typical listening volumes, Beosound Explore has the endurance to explore with you. With a high-performance battery you can rely on, be free to adventure far and wide.


DUST AND WATERPROOF
An all-weather, any-terrain speaker
–
Premium materials in a compact design, Beosound Explore has been crafted for all life's adventures. An IP67 dust and water resistance rating ensures this rugged speaker is ready to face the elements, it can even withstand being submerged in a metre of water for up to 30 minutes.


EASY-ACCESS BUTTONS
Water-resistant control panel
–
Designed to work under any circumstance – covered in water, sand or grease – even with gloves on. The easy-to-use push buttons are placed to ensure excellent visibility & usability, wherever you are.


SEAMLESS STREAMING
Your music, anywhere
–
A streamlined set up and the latest Bluetooth technology means you can pick and play your music in a matter of seconds. Quick, reliable access to your favourite streams, devices and services, every time.
 
INCLUDED IN THE BOX

Beosound Explore

MarketingInfo.element:
BEOPLAY EQ

Adaptive noise cancelling wireless earphones

Immerse yourself in pure sound. Noise cancelling earphones with 6 built-in microphones, for clear calls and authentic audio.


 
 
SOUND
Authentic audio

Tuned by acclaimed sound engineers, true noise cancelling earphones delivering Bang & Olufsen Signature Sound. Enjoy powerful, authentic audio delivered by a 6.88 mm driver. The powerful audio performance is enhanced by a customisable fit for passive noise reduction.


ANC
Adaptive noise cancelling headphones
–
Adaptive ANC and Acoustic technology creates a stable performance for total silence, authentic audio and crystal clear calls without distraction. Compensating for a wide variety of background noises, Beoplay EQ offer true wireless immersion wherever you are.

CONNECTIVITY
Seamless connections
–
For a true wireless listening experience, Beoplay EQ support a variety of streaming options, including Bluetooth 5.2. The ultra-low-power performance and advanced technology ensures more stable connections for lower battery consumption, so you can stay in sync for longer.
 


BATTERY
Wireless charging

An advanced battery offers up to 20 hours of playtime or 6.5 hours with ANC, with a fast charge feature for an additional two hours of playtime with just a 20-minute charge.


MATERIALS
High-quality materials

Made from durable premium materials, including anodised aluminium and sweat-resistant textured housing. The compact, aluminium charging case features a rubber-coated base optimised for Qi-charging.


DESIGN
Elegantly ergonomic

Beoplay EQ are ergonomically shaped to fit comfortably. Interchangeable ear tips in a variety of sizes allow adjustment for a snug fit. The aluminium touch interface offers easy access to features.
 
WORK FROM HOME
Freedom to work anywhere

Stay in touch with 6-microphones and market leading directional beamform technology for crystal clear calls. Enjoy moving freely throughout your home while connected to important calls with hands free or take part in a video conference while staying aware of your surroundings with Transparency Mode. The long-lasting battery matches you step for step and when you need extra time, a brief twenty-minute charge gives you two more hours of playtime.

MarketingInfo.element:
Gaming headset GTWS-2 Doublebee

Are you a serious gamer looking for the ultimate audio experience? Look no further than this gaming headset from Canyon — DoubleBee GTWS-2. These true wireless earphones are designed specifically for gaming, providing an immersive audio experience. With a low latency of just 45ms in gaming mode, you'll never miss a beat or experience any lag. There’s also a dedicated Music mode, which ensures the best possible audio quality. The earphones use Bluetooth 5.3 for a stable and energy-efficient connection to your gaming device, allowing you to move around without worrying about losing your connection. With an impressive battery life of up to 4 hours on a single charge and up to 37.5 hours with the charging case, you'll never have to worry about running out of juice mid-game. Besides, the earbuds have a quick charge mode: from zero to full battery in just 60 minutes. It’s worth noting that the charging case has a unique design that resembles the iconic Bumblebee. Available in black, orange, and yellow, this case definitely looks fresh in the world of gray and white earbuds. Get a next-level experience with DoubleBee – the new true wireless headset from Canyon Gaming!

Beoplay E4

Advanced Active Noise Cancelling in-ear earphones featuring direct and precise sound, unparalleled comfort and hassle-free control.

 
ACTIVE NOISE CANCELLATION
For sound, silence and serenity
–
With next generation hybrid Active Noise Cancellation (ANC), you can immerse yourself in Bang & Olufsen Signature Sound while shutting out the noisy world around you. Beoplay E4 puts powerful ANC in your pocket and always within easy reach.
TRANSPARENCY MODE
Tune into Your Surroundings
–
Immerse yourself in music — or let the world in. With one quick gesture, Transparency Mode turns the music off and lets you tune into your surroundings. Using the same gesture again will turn the ANC back on and start the music where you left off.
DESIGN
Ultra-light, sleek and robust
–
The in-ear headphones are crafted from elegant lightweight metal that's durable and scratch-resistant. The inline remote and ANC control unit come with a sleek aluminium and rubber finish for improved interaction and durability.
COMFORT
Secure and incredibly comfortable
–
Beoplay E4 comes with a selection of ear tips including Comply™ memory foam tips that enhance noise cancelling capabilities while providing a secure and comfortable fit. For those preferring silicone ear tips, four different sizes are included in the box.
PERFORMANCE
All day every day
–
Beoplay E4 delivers no less than 20 hours of play time with Active Noise Cancellation. And thankfully, running out of battery doesn't kill the music. It only pauses the ANC until your next charge.

Focused on innovation and quality, Logitech designs personal peripherals to help people enjoy a better experience with the digital world. The company started in 1981 with mice, which (new at the time) provided a more intuitive way of interacting with a personal computer. Logitech became the worldwide leader in computer mice, and have reinvented the mouse in dozens of ways to match the evolving needs of PC and laptop users. Since those early days, company have expanded our expertise in product design beyond the computer mouse, with a broad portfolio of interface devices that are the “last inch” between you and your computer or your console game, digital music or home-entertainment system.

–
A combination of powerful amplifiers and drivers create True360 sound tuned by Bang & Olufsen engineers, offering an authentic sound experience and optimal dispersion whatever your environment. Beolit 20 plays low at 37–20.000Hz to create a wide, satisfying bass range.
BATTERY
Longer listening times
–
Enjoy up to 8 hours playtime at a typical listening volume on a single charge and also use the wireless Qi charging feature to power your devices. With handy USB-C charging and a bigger battery capacity, Beolit 20 keeps the party going for longer.
DESIGN
Contemporary Classic
–
An evolution of an iconic speaker design, Beolit 20 offers a modern take on the classic Beolit silhouette with a number of design updates including a new grille and a simplified, intuitive suite of control buttons.
 
WIRELESS
A portable power bank
–
Charge your Qi compatible phones and devices with Beolit 20 and its built-in wireless charging station. The elegantly designed top tray makes it possible to charge devices by placing them over the circular “charging” sign in the centre.
 


CONNECTIVITY
Seamless Streams
–
A wireless speaker designed for straightforward connectability, Beolit 20 features simple, reliable connections between your speaker and devices. Choose your source and start enjoying powerful sound with minimal setup.


STEREO
Easy pairing for stereo sound
–
As well as providing powerful sound in its own right, Beolit 20 is designed with speedy and seamless stereo pairing in mind. Connect to another Beolit 20 or Beolit 17 for stereo sound – ideal for large parties or gatherings at home and outside.


PORTABILITY
Powerful sound - easily transported
–
Tough yet lightweight anodised aluminium, a robust polymer base and a vegetable tanned leather strap mean this wireless speaker is easy to carry and to place wherever you want it – throughout your home, garden or head out to the park, and beyond.
 
MATERIALS
Enduring elegance
–
Expertly crafted using a selection of premium materials, Beolit 20 is a tactile and durable portable speaker. Anodised aluminium ensures the body is robust while the new vegetable tanned leather strap is as secure as it is naturally supple.

MarketingInfo.element:
Gaming headset GTWS-2 Doublebee

Are you a serious gamer looking for the ultimate audio experience? Look no further than this gaming headset from Canyon — DoubleBee GTWS-2. These true wireless earphones are designed specifically for gaming, providing an immersive audio experience. With a low latency of just 45ms in gaming mode, you'll never miss a beat or experience any lag. There’s also a dedicated Music mode, which ensures the best possible audio quality. The earphones use Bluetooth 5.3 for a stable and energy-efficient connection to your gaming device, allowing you to move around without worrying about losing your connection. With an impressive battery life of up to 4 hours on a single charge and up to 37.5 hours with the charging case, you'll never have to worry about running out of juice mid-game. Besides, the earbuds have a quick charge mode: from zero to full battery in just 60 minutes. It’s worth noting that the charging case has a unique design that resembles the iconic Bumblebee. Available in black, orange, and yellow, this case definitely looks fresh in the world of gray and white earbuds. Get a next-level experience with DoubleBee – the new true wireless headset from Canyon Gaming!

  • Music & gaming modes
  • Low latency for gaming
  • Power display
  • Awesome backlight
  • Up to 4 h of playback
  • Up to 37.5h of work with the case
  • 60 min earbuds quick charge
  • Energy-effective Bluetooth 5.3
  • Touch control
  • Multiple colors

Have you already tried true wireless earphones? There is a chance you won’t look back with Canyon OnGo 10 earbuds. OnGo 10 earbuds are controlled by touch and have a voice assistant to inform you about the status of your earphones. The case supports Quick Charge technology. You can get a full charge for your earphones in just 50 minutes. Elegant and ergonomic, these TWS earphones do look great in any color: black, deep blue, or beige. We added earcaps in three sizes to make the fit ideal for you. Pick one today and bring joy to your ears!

MarketingInfo.element:
Portable wireless speaker BSP-8
 

The new Canyon portable wireless speaker is ready to blast your all-time favorites. Rated at 10 Watts, it is a travel-sized powerhouse. Rounded shapes, compact size, and a neat little handle make it a perfect companion for a trip or a countryside party with your friends! The RGB backlight on top will look awesome after dark, and you can easily find the playback control buttons there. Enjoy up to 3 hours of music while being connected with Bluetooth, and once the battery dies - just plug it in with about any Type-C cable. Besides, you can use AUX, USB, or a MicroSD memory card as your media source. We truly recommend using Bluetooth – what’s better than switching playlists on the fly? As far as 10 meters from the speaker, the connection remains stable. Get your BSP-8 speaker in red, gray, or black – your adventures need to get a soundtrack.

Features:

  • 10W Power
  • RGB Backlight
  • Bluetooth 5.2
  • Range up to 10 m
  • Playback Time On Battery up to 3 hours
  • Media Source: BT, TF card, AUX, USB

MarketingInfo.element:
True wireless stereo headset TWS-5


These wireless headphones are designed for those who are constantly on the move and love to listen to music in high quality playback. The latest version of Bluetooth 5.3 ensures stable pairing both with the audio source and between the right and left earbuds. In addition, thanks to this protocol, the operating time of the headset has been increased up to 7.5 hours. Clear and surround stereo sound will allow you to enjoy your favorite music in high quality. The TWS function allows you to pair it with a second BT TWS speaker for immersive stereo sound experience. The headset allows you to receive phone calls and use voice assistant without touching your smartphone. To charge the headphone box, a USB Type-C cable is used, the same one used in most modern smartphones. The comfortable design of the ear buds with silicone ear tips ensures a snug fit in the ear. Additional ear cushions in different sizes allow you to choose the right ones for you, ensuring the most comfortable fit. Reliable audio gadget for those who love an active lifestyle!

Features:

  • Energy saving technology BT 5.3
  • Touch control
  • Automatic pairing
  • 38 hours of work including charging box
  • 2 hours of charging time for the box
  • Battery capacity 40 mAh (earphone), 500 mAh (charging box)
  • Charging input: USB Type-C
  • Possibility of using one or both earphones
  • 3 pairs of vacuum earbuds of different sizes included

MarketingInfo.element:
BEOPLAY EX

Next-gen wireless earbuds

As versatile as they are beautiful, these earbuds with wireless charging case and active noise cancellation bring deep sound and snug comfort in one sleek package.
 

Comfortable fit


Rain and sweatproof


Made for multi-tasking

SNUG FIT
Comfort you can count on

Beoplay EX fits. With your lifestyle and your ears. An all-new ergonomic design gives you complete comfort right out of the case, while soft tips let you listen for hours without fatigue. Whether you're walking, running or jumping, the stick silhouette ensures stability, while staying snug and flush to your ears.
 
ADAPTIVE ACTIVE NOISE CANCELLATION
Peace of mind

Turn a loud train ride into a moment of focus. Or make your run a meditative experience. EX monitors ambient outside sound and adapts to cut it out, so you can enjoy distraction-free listening and the highest quality calls – wherever you are. Want to let the world in? Transparency Mode takes care of that in just a tap.
 


POTENT SOUND
Looks small. Sounds mighty.

Beoplay EX punches well above its size, with fuller bass and a level of detail that is unbeatable for such a compact form. A 9.2mm driver in each earbud brings the power – everywhere, every time.


WATERPROOF CONSTRUCTION
Water? Don't sweat it.

Caught in a downpour? Bring it on. Beoplay EX stays waterproof in up to a metre of water for 30 minutes, and stands up to dust and sand, thanks to its IP57-rated build quality. There's no such thing as bad weather, just the wrong earphones.


MICROPHONE
Clear? Crystal.

Carefully positioned to be closer to your mouth, the stick houses six microphones that let you take and make calls with confidence. Background noise? Intelligent beam-forming technology distinguishes between your voice and other sounds, so you're always crystal clear.
Best in glass

Form meets function. Fashion meets fidelity. A glass touch surface brings precision and jewel-like beauty, while an aluminium outer ring offers protection and a final aesthetic flourish. Crafted to last, made to be worn.


PRECISION DETAILING


JEWEL-LIKE DESIGN


LITHOGRAPHIC LOGOS


REAL GLASS AND ALUMINIUM


BATTERY LIFE
Little goes a long way
–
Listen for up to 6 hours with ANC on, or 8 hours with ANC off. When it's time to recharge, simply slide EX back into their wireless charging case to get juiced up for the next play. A total of 28 hours.


CONNECTIVITY
Quick to pair. Quick to play.
–
Slide the earbuds out of the aluminium case and you're connected. That easy. Enjoy low-latency listening across both Android and iOS with Bluetooth 5.2 and aptX(TM) Adaptive technology. You can switch devices seamlessly with Multipoint pairing. EX has you covered.
 
INCLUDED IN THE BOX

  • Charging case with wireless Qi receiver

  • Earbuds: Left and Right

  • USB-A/USB-C cable for charging, 0.5 m

  • COMPLY™ Medium size

  • Silicone tips, 4 sizes

  • Quick start guide

MarketingInfo.element:
True wireless stereo headset TWS-6
 

It’s easy to get lost in the market of true wireless earphones, but don’t worry – there’s a good option just for you. TWS-6 is the right choice for anyone looking for a great audio experience while on the go. They are lightweight with a comfy, secure fit. Silicone case included into the box will protect your device from scratches, bumps and drops. The battery life is impressive, with up to 4.5 hours of playback on a single charge. With the charging case, you can get up to 21 hours. If that isn’t enough, charge it in just two hours with any Type-C cable. The controls are intuitive and easy to use. The Bluetooth 5.3 connectivity is reliable and energy-effective, allowing you to keep a stable connection to your phone or other devices. Also, a low latency of 50ms makes these earphones suitable for gaming. It would be an excellent choice for those who want a great audio experience!

Features:

  • 13 mm speakers, 20 Hz – 20 kHz
  • Automatic pairing
  • Energy effective BT 5.3
  • Up to 10 m of Bluetooth range
  • Stereo sound in phone calls
  • 22 hours from battery (with charging case)
  • Voice assistant & gaming mode support
  • Low gaming latency
  • Silicone case included

OnGo 10 ANC

Have you already tried true wireless earphones? There is a chance you won’t look back with Canyon OnGo 10 earbuds. With the energy-efficient Bluetooth 5.3, they offer long playtime and stable connection to your device even if you’re not close. Perfect for music and calls thanks to four microphones: active noise canceling ensures you hear what you want to hear. Besides, it is activated automatically in-call. OnGo 10 earbuds are controlled by touch and have a voice assistant to inform you about the status of your earphones. The case supports Quick Charge technology. You can get a full charge for your earphones in just 50 minutes. Elegant and ergonomic, these TWS earphones do look great in any color: black, deep blue, or beige. We added earcaps in three sizes to make the fit ideal for you. Pick one today and bring joy to your ears!

MarketingInfo.element:
BEOSOUND EXPLORE

All-round sound for the adventurous

Portable. Tough. Ready to go. No matter where your adventures take you, the uncompromising sound quality of the Beosound Explore will get you there. And with its hardened, scratch-resistant, and fully dust and waterproof shell you’ll arrive no worse for wear.
 
 
DURABILITY IN ITS DNA
Tough enough for any expedition
–
Built to go where you go, Beosound Explore is an ultra-durable wireless speaker. The tough rubberised base and aluminium body mean it can be placed safely on all sorts of surfaces – from muddy campsites to sandy beaches – while a meticulously constructed internal design protects against drops and falls. From the hard anodised aluminium shell developed in Factory 5, Denmark, to the waterproof strap and carabiner, every element of the construction blends high performance with durability.
Designed to go with you

Meticulously designed so you can take it with you, Beosound Explore is a tactile speaker that fits in the palm of your hand. Clip to a belt, strap to a backpack or simply grab it and go.


LIGHTWEIGHT AT ONLY 631 GRAMS


GRAB-AND-GO SHAPE


WEATHER RESISTANT, FLEXIBLE STRAP


STRONG, CLIP-ON CARABINER

Durable


Portable


Powerful

MUSIC ANYWHERE
Superior sound, even outdoors
–
With surprisingly heavy bass for a speaker of its size, Beosound Explore brings your music to places beyond the expected. The grill is precision cut to deliver True360 sound, driven by dual 1.8 full range drivers that pack a real punch. Whether set in the middle of a campsite, hung from a tent or perched on a rock halfway up a mountain, Beosound Explore provides powerful sound.


EXCEPTIONAL BATTERY LIFE
Powering your adventures
–
With up to 27 hours of playtime at typical listening volumes, Beosound Explore has the endurance to explore with you. With a high-performance battery you can rely on, be free to adventure far and wide.


DUST AND WATERPROOF
An all-weather, any-terrain speaker
–
Premium materials in a compact design, Beosound Explore has been crafted for all life's adventures. An IP67 dust and water resistance rating ensures this rugged speaker is ready to face the elements, it can even withstand being submerged in a metre of water for up to 30 minutes.


EASY-ACCESS BUTTONS
Water-resistant control panel
–
Designed to work under any circumstance – covered in water, sand or grease – even with gloves on. The easy-to-use push buttons are placed to ensure excellent visibility & usability, wherever you are.


SEAMLESS STREAMING
Your music, anywhere
–
A streamlined set up and the latest Bluetooth technology means you can pick and play your music in a matter of seconds. Quick, reliable access to your favourite streams, devices and services, every time.
 
INCLUDED IN THE BOX

Beosound Explore
Carabiner
Quick Start Guide
USB-C to USB-A cable
